resources.string: Grant access to enable all features
Allow FIND-E to use your smartphone’s basic functions to proceed.
FIND-E needs bluetooth to connect to your phonehead send its location in real time. It uses low energy bluetooth technology which consumes very little of the battery life.
FIND-E needs location to connect to your phonehead send its location in real time. It uses low energy bluetooth technology which consumes very little of the battery life.
You cannot continue using app without all rermissions
FIND-E needs basic access to work properly. Tap “Info” icon to see access details.
